vendor_name: Ace Hotel & Swim Club Palm Springs
title: Stylish Mid-Century Palm Springs Haven with Retro Swim Club & Daily US$30 Breakfast Credit
description:
Find your slice of California cool where swaying palms, sparkling pools and mid-century charm invite you to unwind under the desert sun. The newly renovated pool club, open to all for poolside sips and DJ-led parties, is the ultimate sunny and relaxing oasis.

Start your day with a visit to the coffee bar and savour everything from acai bowls and chilaquiles to ricotta pancakes for breakfast at the all-day onsite King’s Highway Diner. Cool off in one of two shimmering pools, or unwind at Feel Good Spa with a tension-melting treatment.

Perfectly placed for exploration, the hotel sits minutes from downtown Palm Springs’ buzzing nightlife, vintage boutiques and iconic mid-century architecture. Hike through Indian Canyons, ride the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway or simply soak in the desert serenity - the choice is yours.
